definitions.definition: Words that rhyme have the same last sound:
a word that has the same last sound as another word:
examples: Can you think of a rhyme for "orange"?

definitions.definition: a short poem, especially for young children:
examples: a book of rhymes and songs

definitions.definition: the use of rhymes in poetry:
examples: This poem is her first attempt at rhyme.

definitions.definition: written as a poem so that the word at the end of a line has the same last sound as a word at the end of another line:
examples: A lot of modern poetry is not written in rhyme.

definitions.definition: the vowel in the middle of a syllable, and any sounds after it in the syllable
